title: Grammys Show Producer Explains The Origin Of Onstage Mashups
teaser: Katy Perry, Sam Smith, Meghan Trainor and Taylor Swift are just a few of the musicians up for Grammy Awards. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with the executive producer of the award show, Ken Ehrlich.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
